article_text: Winston Apple and John Sutton have a combined 42 years of teaching experience in Independence schools. Winner will face Noel Torpey in November.

Winner will face Noel Torpey in November.
Winston Apple and John Sutton have a combined 42 years of teaching experience in Independence schools.
